heading: Equal time rule (Broadcasting).
alt-heading: Equal time rule (Broadcasting). Law and legislation.
general-note: Here are entered works dealing with the requirement that equal opportunities for broadcasting be afforded to all legally qualified candidates for public office if any one such candidate is permitted to broadcast. Works dealing with the requirement that broadcasters presenting one side of a controversial issue of public importance must afford reasonable opportunity for the presentation of contrasting views are entered under. Fairness doctrine (Broadcasting)..
